TRIVIA=

Did you know that the Ikedaya fight scene in the RK OVA was based on 
the =
scene in the film Byakkotai?  This can be seen easily because 
the animator=
s copied the live action movie frame by frame in the 
part where the Choshu=
 samurai pour out onto the balcony/rooftop.  
I'm not talking about the par=
t where everyone is in the dark and the 
fireflies illuminate the swords bu=
t a bit later on in that sequence. 
It's so cool I will post screencaps lat=
er.
